summary: This is requested from me most often: A small house for mages in Winterhold. Mod adds a tiny house, an apothecary and smithing facilities to Winterhold town. Beautiful clutter, lots of unique item display, bookshelves and glorious workstation galore!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/lMrXLiz.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/50156/?][/url][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][color=#cc4125][size=6][b][/b][/size][/color][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________

This has been suggested to me several times - mages need a sweet-ashhhh crib near their college!

And what the poop, Winterhold, get a grip! Yes, the collapsh was bad mkay but get a healthy dose of man the beep up and start rebuilding! To get back on its feet, Winterhold has supported a new alchemist to set up shop in town, because mages are good bizniz. Council (consisting of jarl and his steward) has also put effort into some serious real estate (Vellamo) and invested in a communal smithing spot. Winterhold will be back on the map in no time!
__________________

Mod adds a small mage themed house above Winterhold, an Apothecary next to the Jarl's house, and smithing facilities next to the Frozen Hearth Inn

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vellamo]Vellamo is a sea goddess in the Finnish mythology[/url]
___________________________________________________

[b][color=#b22222][size=4]:: REQUIREMENTS :: [/size][/color][/b]
- Skyrim up to date
- Dawnguard.esm
- Dragonborn.esm
___________________________________________________

[youtube]a-Y_5AHZrPM[/youtube]


Location: Winterhold town entrance
Key: Purchase the deed from the Apothecary, the key is inside the letter
Crafting facilities: All vanilla and Dragonborn crafting except a smelter.
Forge in the town is an "All Forge" which will craft Dawnguard, Skyforge and Skaal items
___________________________________________________

[b][color=#b22222][size=4]:: FEATURES :: [/size][/color][/b]
- Navmeshed so followers/spouse can navigate
- Bed gives Well Rested bonus
- Tons of custom named storage
- Secret room for lots of display space for uniques (Masks, claws, other unique mage/Daedric items)
- Lots of bookshelves
- My signature wardrobe
- Respawnable garden
- Outhouse
___________________________________________________

[b][color=orange][size=4]:: GENERAL :: [/size][/color][/b]
- None of the storage INSIDE will respawn. All storage is safe but OUTSIDE MAY RESPAWN.
- The basement is a neutral zone so the garden should respawn
- [color=#b22222]No[/color] family or follower beds
- Decor is locked in place so it's Fus Ro Dah safe
___________________________________________________

[b][color=#b22222][size=4]:: POSSIBLE CONFLICTS/ISSUES :: [/size][/color][/b]

[size=4][b][color=#cc4125]Incompatible with Darkwater Den[/color][/b]
[/size]And I don't have the time or the energy to fix this kind of stuff.

I added a new VendorItem keyword (VendorItemDeed) to allow Dante to sell the deed.
It's added to the VendorApothecary list so mods that change these keywords might cause trouble.

[b][color=#b22222][size=4]:: KNOWN ISSUES :: [/size][/color][/b]
- The stairs are annoying to use (have to jump), it's part of the small house model resource, I cannot change it.
___________________________________________________

[b][color=orange][size=4]:: THANKS TO :: [/size][/color][/b]
Nifskope team for Nifskope
TESA for resources and help
Nahkin: Helping me with scripts and allowing me to use his display scripts and being super awesome
DarkFox127: His new modder's resources and being a good friend
Nexus moderation and staff for awesomeness
All the awesome people listed below
___________________________________________________

[b][color=orange][size=4]:: CREDITS :: [/size][/color][/b]
Brett: FPI Project Experiment Pack
Lrsamways: Clutter meshes
Jokerine: Awesome new clutter items
Blary: Alchemy and other clutter resources
Stoverjm: New Open Books
InsanitySorrow: Bed clutter, wash stuffs, assorted clutter and textures
Stroti/Tamira: Kitchen and craftsman clutter/tools, small house resource, outhouse
BS/Tamira/mrsiika: Seaview resource
breti: New world resource
langley02: Most of the new textures on the house
mrdave: New textures
Osmodius: House textures (floor)
Lilith: Ready clutter and catering
Oaristys: Modder's Resource Pack
TESA: Resource Kit
Berticus: Potion crates
tueffelachtein: Modular crafting table & upper class resources
The_Funktasm: Morrowind clutter & textures
drsoupIII for the awesome little knapsacks <3

Witcher 2 models conversions: L0rd0fWar

The Witcher 2 armours' mesh and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used with permission.
The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved.
http://www.cdprojekt.com/
___________________________________________________

[color=#a52a2a][size=5][b]:: FAQ ::[/b][/size][/color]
Q: Mods in screenies? Recommended mods?
A: Texture Pack Combiner recommendations with SMC. Detailed Rugs. Seasons of Skyrim ENB that I use with my old Somber Lut Sepia enbpalette.bmp. ELE. Relighting Skyrim. Furniture and Clutter - HD Retextures. Langley's textures.

Q: I CAN'T AFFORD THIS S***!?
A: It's all about speech skill, baby. Lend me some sugar, I am your neighbour!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/XaiUx.gif[/img]

Q: QQ Y U SO DLC ლ(ಠ益ಠლ)
A: I wanted to be able to display unique DB and DG items. You are free to modify the mod to your personal needs.

Q; IT'S TOO SMALL!
A: If you need a bigger place, how about Arch-Mage's Quarters?
Q: I WANT MY FAMILY, MY 5 SERVANTS AND THE WHOLE OF SOVNGARDE TO JOIN ME IN THIS HOUSE PLS MAKE MOAR BEDS.
A: Don't even. Not ever. Nope. That's final.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iz6ISrC.gif[/img]

Q: I CAN'T LOOT ANYTHING!?1!!+1+1
A: Why yes, I lock my clutter in place. Can't have you ruining my Feng Shui when you come barging in at 2 AM after drinking all night with Sam Guevenne.

Q: AUTOSORT!!!111 AUTO SORT DERP HERP HURR DURRR OEDGkdsöglk<sdöglKDGöSAJGÖL!!!
A: NO HERPGBHGDGÖDSLGKÖ DSLGJSDLGJÖ! NO. Just no. Not ever.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/f0czank.gif[/img]

Q: Stupid location. QQ.
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/ukQbKwO.gif[/img]
[/center]
